title: Tablet with Cuneiform
description:
Terracotta tablet. 6 lines of Sumerian cuneiform on obverse; 1 line on reverse. It is from a clay envelope. Text has not been read.
Condition: Good but for one gouge.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
